prayers.title: Sign of the Cross
prayers.latin: In nomine Patris, et Filii, et Spiritus Sancti. Amen.
prayers.english: In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

prayers.title: Penitential Act
prayers.latin: Confiteor Deo omnipotenti et vobis, fratres, quia peccavi nimis cogitatione, verbo, opere et omissione: mea culpa, mea culpa, mea maxima culpa.
prayers.english: I confess to almighty God and to you, my brothers and sisters, that I have greatly sinned, in my thoughts and in my words, in what I have done and in what I have failed to do, through my fault, through my fault, through my most grievous fault.

prayers.title: Lord Have Mercy
prayers.latin: Kyrie eleison. Christe eleison. Kyrie eleison.
prayers.english: Lord have mercy. Christ have mercy. Lord have mercy.

prayers.title: Glory to God
prayers.latin: Gloria in excelsis Deo et in terra pax hominibus bonae voluntatis...
prayers.english: Glory to God in the highest, and on earth peace to people of good will...
